content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jul 17 (APP):National Assembly Speaker Sardar Ayaz Sadiq on Thursday commended the security forces for their resolute bravery and professionalism in executing a successful counter-terrorism operation in Balochistan's Awaran district, and for playing a pivotal role in neutralizing threats and safeguarding national security. In a statement, the Speaker commended the professionalism and effectiveness of the security forces in their ongoing operations against terrorism, calling their efforts a testament to Pakistan's unwavering resolve. Expressing profound sorrow over the martyrdom of Major Syed Rab Nawaz Tariq during the Awaran operation, the Speaker paid glowing tribute to the officer's courage and dedication, calling him a symbol of valor in the fight against terrorism. He said the nation pays heartfelt homage to Major Tariq's heroism, whose sacrifice stands as a beacon of resilience and patriotism. "Martyrs like him are the true guardians of Pakistan's security and freedom," he added. The Speaker extended his heartfelt condolences to the bereaved family, stating that he shares equally in their grief during this time of sorrow and distress. He prayed for the elevation of Major Tariq's ranks and for strength and patience for the family to bear this irreparable loss. Condemning hostile elements such as Fitan-e-Hind operating under Indian patronage in Balochistan, the Speaker affirmed that such conspiracies will meet a decisive and unforgiving end. He emphasized that the entire nation stands shoulder to shoulder with its security forces in the mission to eradicate terrorism. "The sacrifices of Pakistan's brave officers and soldiers will never be forgotten. Their unwavering commitment is a source of national pride," he said. Reiterating national unity, the Speaker declared that the people of Pakistan, alongside their armed forces, will resolutely defeat every conspiracy hatched by the enemy. He hailed those who lay down their lives for the country's defense and stability as the true heroes of the nation.
